entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Sydney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:57 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: J.A. Douglas McCurdy Sydney Airport 01:00 AM AST Monday 23 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -4.1°C
Wind: SW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain at times heavy in the morning. Rainfall amount 30 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Drizzle or rain. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to drizzle and showers in the evening. Amount 10 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 in the evening. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
